artist: George Washington Maher; Gorham Manufacturing Company; Spaulding & Company, Chicago, Illinois
creditline: Gift of funds from the Decorative Arts Council with proceeds from the 2005 Antiques Show and Sale
description: small spoon with egg-shaped gold-washed bowl; handle decorated with long-stemmed lilies with two flowers and two buds and EKG monogram
title: Coffee spoon, from a twelve-piece place setting
